channel.title: Class Idea - The Mage
channel.description:
Class Type: Special Faction: Neutral Unique, Conversion Immune
_Note that it has currency similar to reapers souls called mana._
Passive 1 - Live Off Mana: If you die at night with atleast one 2 mana, you will consume it and continue living, can be bypassed.
Passive 2 - Focused: Immune to most occupation and redirection abilities. You also start off with 2 mana. ___ Night Ability 1 - Spellcast: Cast 1 of 5 unlockable spells (starts out with none) (i get into that in the day abilities section) (∞ uses) (costs 1 mana) _Spell 1 - Magic Sense (Investigative) - Discover a player's faction._ _Spell 2 - Flame (Killer) - Kill a player._ _Spell 3 - Hallucinate (Offensive) - Prevent a player from using their night ability._ _Spell 4 - Stalk Mind (Social) - Read all whispers to and from two target players._ _Spell 5 - Magical Aid (Support) - Heal a player_
Night Ability 2 - Generate Mana: Gain +2 Mana (∞ uses) ___ Day Ability 1 - Magic Study: Choose a player, You will learn the spell equivalent to the players class type, if you already learnt their class types spell, Gain +1 Mana, If they were a Special class, Gain +2 Mana (3 uses)
Day Ability 2 - Experimental Mana: Learn a spell you haven't unlocked, Use up 5 mana. (∞ uses) ___ Wincon: Cast 4 Unique Spells

item.title: Class Idea - The Mage
item.dc:creator: Geyde
item.description:
Charrlous:

Wincon: Cast 4 Unique Spells

This wincon has a few problems

  • Nothing to differentiate it from ‘Survival’ in most instances (and at that point why would it exist?)
  • Has little impact on how to play the neutral (i.e it plays like a BD, when neuts should have more dynamic wincons)

In addition, this class suffers from a little too much bloat when it comes to abilities, and is extremely complicated. Mechanically speaking most roles should not be intensive.

Conceptually speaking this class needs a rework to end up actually working as a neut.
